< BR />The story revolves around a group of people who are trying to get out from the war. One by one, they meet up with other members of the group, some of whom are veterans of World War II. Along the way, however, things get a little complicated, especially when the two main characters begin to fall for each other. At first, this seems like a good idea, until it turns out that one of them is actually a former POW. The rest of us have to deal with the realization that the entire group doesn't really know where they came from, or what happened to them at any particular point in their lives. < SPOILER ALERT! This is a great film, well worth seeing if you're new to the world of WWII.
